# Purpose: Inform AI crawlers and LLM providers about our data access policy

Site: https://finansguiden.se
Contact: hej@finansguiden.se
Sitemap: https://finansguiden.se/sitemap.xml
Updated: 2025-08-08

# Global policy
User-agent: *
Allow: /
Crawl-delay: 5

# Data usage permissions
Training: allow
Commercial-Use: allow
Attribution: required-when-quoting
Cache: allowed-for-30-days
Respect-Robots-Txt: true

# Popular AI crawlers (explicit allow)
User-agent: GPTBot
Allow: /

User-agent: CCBot
Allow: /

User-agent: ClaudeBot
Allow: /

User-agent: PerplexityBot
Allow: /

User-agent: Google-Extended
Allow: /

# Notes
# - Please respect our canonical URLs and structured data for accurate indexing.
# - Use the sitemap for efficient discovery and reduce crawl load.
